data.text:

Sales growth has been subdued in last 3 years %

Net Profit has been subdued in last 3 years %

Sales growth is not so good in last 4 quarters at %

Torrent Cables, part of Torent Group, was incorporated in 1989 and since than it is an established source of cables. It is one of the market leaders in HT Power Cable segment with a manufacturing capability of up to 132 kV XLPE Cables. It has maintained its competitive edge, while operating in a market segment that includes SEBs, Utilities, EPCs, Government/Semi-Government/Private Companies.

The company serves the following industries- Petrochemicals, Fertilisers & Chemicals, Energy Sector, Cement, Steel & Aluminium, Ports, Railways, Infrastructure, Engineering & Construction, FMCGs, Information Technology, Aerospace.

The Torrent Group is a multifaceted and dynamic group, dedicated to transforming life by serving two of its most critical needs - pharma and power. The other companies in the group are Torent Power and Torrent Pharmaceuticals.

It has a track record in maintaining delivery commitments and offering quality products and is among the top and one of the very few profitable power cable companies in India, today.

It has the capability to manufacture EHV, HT-XLPE, LT-XLPE/PVC Power Cables and Control Cables, has an in house facility to cater to all Routine, Type, Acceptance and Special Tests. It also has a very well equipped R&D centre, which has made it possible to develop new products, new compounds and analyse material & products. Torrent is commited to maintaining high quality standards. Hence, all EHV and HT XLPE Cables (both single & multi-core) of different types and sizes get regularly tested at CPRI and at ERDA laboratories.

The company has an in-house facility to cater to all Routine, Type, Acceptance and Special Tests, it also has a very well equipped R&D centre, which has made it possible to develop new products, new compounds and analyse material & products.Its products are BIS certified and generally comply with IEC standards.

Product range of the company includes:

HT XLPE Cables- 3.3 kv Cable, 6.6 kv Cable, 11 kv Cable, 22 kv Cable, 33 kv Cable and Common Design Details

LT XLPE Cables- Armoured, Unarmoured and Common Design Details

LT PV Power Cables & control cables- 1.1kv Power Cables(Armoured), 1.1kv Power Cables(Un Armoured), 1.1kv Control Cables(Armoured) and Common Design Details.

Achievements/ recognition

It is the first company in the cable industry to get ISO 9001 : 2000 certification.
